amendment.description: An amendment comprised of the following amendments printed in House Report 119-167 as en bloc No. 2: Nos. 1, 14, 15, 19, 25, 28, and 32.
amendment.purpose: Amendment en bloc No. 2 comprised of the amendments numbered 1, 14, 15, 19, 25, 28, and 32, printed in House Report 119-167.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Carter (TX) amendments (A002) Agreed to by recorded vote: 219 - 206 (Roll no. 180).

action.text: Amendments en bloc (A002) offered by Mr. Carter (TX).
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Carter (TX) amendments (A002) Agreed to by recorded vote: 219 - 206 (Roll no. 180).
